hero.title: Websites that
hero.description: PixelUp helps businesses build modern, fast and professional websites that convert visitors into customers.

about.title: About
paragraphs: PixelUp is a digital studio focused on creating modern, clean and high-converting websites for businesses that want to stand out online.
We combine strategy, design and development to deliver fast, reliable and scalable web solutions tailored to your business goals.

cards.title: Clean Design
cards.text: Minimal, modern interfaces that reflect your brand and build trust.

cards.title: Performance
cards.text: Optimized websites that load fast and work perfectly on all devices.

cards.title: Growth Ready
cards.text: Scalable foundations so your website grows together with your business.

services.title: Our
services.description: Everything you need to launch, grow and scale your online presence with confidence.

items.title: Business Websites
items.text: Modern, fast and professional websites built to represent your brand and convert visitors.

items.title: Landing Pages
items.text: High-converting landing pages designed for ads, promotions and product launches.

items.title: E-commerce
items.text: Online stores with secure payments, product management and smooth user experience.

items.title: Maintenance & Support
items.text: Ongoing updates, performance optimization and technical support for peace of mind.

whyUs.title: Why choose
whyUs.intro: We don’t just build websites. We help businesses create a strong digital presence that drives real results.

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.text: Get your website live quickly without sacrificing quality.

features.title: Clean & Modern Design
features.text: Designs that look professional and build trust instantly.

features.title: Business Focused
features.text: Every decision is made with your business goals in mind.

features.title: Growth Ready
features.text: Scalable foundations that grow together with your business.

process.title: Our
process.description: A simple and transparent workflow that turns ideas into powerful websites.

steps.title: Consultation
steps.desc: We discuss your goals, audience and requirements.
steps.details: We start with a detailed consultation via Google Meet. We discuss your business goals, target audience, competitors, and expectations. This step ensures we fully understand your vision before moving forward.

steps.title: Design
steps.desc: We create a clean, modern and user-focused design.
steps.details: Based on the consultation, we design a modern and user-friendly interface. You will review the design, request changes, and approve the final layout before development begins.

steps.title: Development
steps.desc: We build a fast, responsive and scalable website.
steps.details: We turn the approved design into a fully functional website. The site is optimized for speed, mobile responsiveness, and scalability using modern technologies.

steps.title: Launch
steps.desc: Your website goes live, optimized and ready to grow.
steps.details: After final testing, your website is deployed and goes live. We ensure everything works perfectly and provide guidance for future updates and growth.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Everything you need to know before starting your project with PixelUp.

items.q: How long does it take to build a website?
items.a: Most websites are completed within 7–14 days, depending on the size and complexity of the project.

items.q: Do you offer consultations before starting?
items.a: Yes. We start every project with a free consultation via Google Meet to understand your goals and needs.

items.q: Will my website be mobile friendly?
items.a: Absolutely. Every website we build is fully responsive and optimized for all devices.

items.q: Can I request changes after the design is ready?
items.a: Yes. You can request revisions during the design phase before development starts.

items.q: Do you provide support after launch?
items.a: Yes. We offer ongoing maintenance, updates, and support packages after your website goes live.

cta.title: Ready to
cta.description: Let’s talk about your idea. We’re fully online and available for consultations via WhatsApp.
